mapper.select: SELECT a."member_num" as "member_num", b."d_journal_id" as "d_journal_id", b."m_calendar_id" as "m_calendar_id", b."diet_id" as "diet_id", b."diet_type" as "diet_type", b."foodCount" as "foodCount", c."food" as "food", c."calories" as "calories", c."carbs" as "carbs", c."protein" as "protein", c."fat" as "fat" FROM dietjournal b join dietlist c ON b."diet_id" = c."diet_id" join membercalendar a ON a."m_calendar_id" = b."m_calendar_id" WHERE b."m_calendar_id" = #{ m_calendar_id} AND "member_num" = #{ member_num}
